      • calculateDistance

        public static double calculateDistance(int txPower,
                                       double rssi)
        This class estimates the distance between the mobile device and a BLE beacon based on the measured RSSI and a txPower calibration value that represents the expected RSSI for an iPhone 5 receiving the signal when it is 1 meter away.

        This class uses a best-fit curve equation with configurable coefficients. The coefficients must be supplied by the caller and are specific to the Android device being used. See the ModelSpecificDistanceCalculator for more information on the coefficients.

        Cf. https://github.com/AltBeacon/android-beacon-library/blob/master/src/main/java/org/altbeacon/beacon/distance/CurveFittedDistanceCalculator.java

        Calculate the estimated distance in meters to the beacon based on a reference rssi at 1m and the known actual rssi at the current location

        Parameters:
        txPower: - reference rssi at 1m
        rssi: - actual rssi at the current location
        Returns:
        estimated distance
